attributes.action: Prevent the Conservative Party from being able to form a government  ever again
attributes.background: The Tories have been in power for nearly a decade. Our country has been battered and bruised by austerity and lies. We need to ensure this doesn't happen again for the sake of future generations and the good of our United Kingdom.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions that are relating to party political issues. 

in any case, the UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for deciding who stands for Parliament and is elected.
